tasks.task_description: Review current website content for unprofessional elements
Update Hero section with professional messaging
Update Contact section with professional tone
Review and update any casual language throughout

description: Make Numeric Shift website more professional by improving content, messaging, and tone
context: Updated Hero section with professional messaging - changed tagline to 'Enterprise Solutions', headline to 'Enterprise Software EXCELLENCE', improved description to mention Fortune 500 companies, and changed buttons to 'Start Project' and 'View Portfolio'
Updated About, Services, and Contact sections with professional content. Removed casual language, improved messaging to focus on enterprise solutions, and made all form elements more professional.
